thread.title: Polish Holocaust law sparks Israeli and U.S. ire

title: Polish Holocaust law sparks Israeli and U.S. ire
text:
Polish Holocaust law sparks Israeli and U.S. ire 3:51pm GMT - 01:58 
Any suggestion Poland was complicit in the Holocaust could now land offenders in jail. The new law has sparked anger from Israel and the United States for stifling debate about the death camps the Nazis built on Polish soil.   
Any suggestion Poland was complicit in the Holocaust could now land offenders in jail. The new law has sparked anger from Israel and the United States for stifling debate about the death camps the Nazis built on Polish soil.  //reut.rs/2nxAiVy
